name: Baldi's Basics XP - Free Exclusive Edition
name_original: Baldi's Basics XP - Free Exclusive Edition
description:
In 1985 he founded the company Basket Hell. Baldis Basics XP: Virtual Experience [Codename: Free Exclusive Edition] an alternate reality of Baldis Basics as a simulation to experience school life
ACTIVATE THE RAINBOW SMOKE TO ENJOY YOURSELF!

 but beware. there something bad it's corrupting...

It's Like Baldi's Basics, But Everything you play and see looks Different.

How does it work?.... Baldi's Basics XP: Free Exclusive Edition, A Alternative Universe of original baldi's Basics.

Credits:

*Limon Games - Director of Free Exclusive Edition

*Mystman12 (Basically! Games) - Creator of Original Baldis Basics

*Paulor94 - Public Demo BBRMS Map Creator

*JoshuaJwad - Aditionnal Art

And some Musics in-game belong to their respective owners :)
